It will power on and first display the splash screen, and then the Home screen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56s9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2t2ce","text":"This protocol is to guide the use of the Qubit 4 Fluorometer in the Stillwater, OK, ARS USDA facility. The complete user guide is also available for download at thermofisher.com/qubit. This guide contains some additional information for Common Lab use and may not be applicable for everyone.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"70bl7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6r249","text":"The Qubit 4 Fluorometer is a benchtop fluorometer that can be used for the quantitation of DNA, RNA, microRNA, and protein, as well as for the measurement of RNA integrity and quality using the highly sensitive and accurate fluorescence based Qubit assays. You can also use the Qubit 4 Fluorometer to directly measure the fluorescence of samples or to create new assays using the MyQubit software preprogrammed into the instrument.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fv7o8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"cgf07","text":"Assay Tubes for the Qubit 4:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1g0a7","text":"Only thin-wall, clear 0.5 mL PCR tubes are appropriate for use in the Qubit 4. Acceptable tubes include the Qubit assay tubes (Cat. No. Q32856, 500 tubes). The minimum assay volume must be 200 µL for an accurate read.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1pe56","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3a7h6","text":"To Perform Assays:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ktvo","text":" A Qubit assay kit appropriate for quantifying your samples (see page 61 of the full manual for available Qubit kits and ordering information)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6e1d1","text":"DNA, RNA, or protein samples","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ealgd","text":"Qubit assay tubes or other appropriate 0.5 mL assay tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6e3uj","text":"Appropriate standards for the assay","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79qti","text":"Optional: USE drive or USB cable for data transfer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1bptq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9b3p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"amjps","text":"General Guidelines:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8i82","text":"Wear gloves during all sample handling.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":39}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7b4t0","text":"Bring all kit reagents to room temperature and insert all assay tubes into instrument only for as much time as it takes for the instrument to measure the sample.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":42}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94bpn","text":"Do not hold the assay tubes in your hand before performing the measurement.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":75}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bls97","text":"Incubate the DNA and RNA assay tubes for 2 minutes after mixing the sample or standard with the working solution.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":113}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"424kf","text":"Incubate the protein assay tubes for 15 minutes after mixing the sample or standard with the working solution.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bbih","text":"Incubate the Broad Range Protein assay tubes for 10 minutes after mixing the sample or standard with the Protein BR Assay Reagent.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56t8d","text":"If you are performing multiple readings of a single tube, remove the tube from the instrument and let it equilibrate to room temperature for 30 seconds before taking another reading.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":182}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54sgh","text":"Note: multiple readings of RNA samples is not recommended.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6kcp","text":"The Qubit does not require regular maintenance.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hrip","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50ntb","text":"To clean the fluorometer periodically:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77i8n","text":"the touchscreen can be cleaned after disconnecting the power cable, using a soft cloth lightly moistened with LCD cleansing detergent.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"222hi","text":"To disinfect, disconnect the power, and clean using a soft cloth lightly moistened with 70% ethanol, 70% isopropanol or 10% bleach.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ea0ot","text":"The cloth included with the instrument is only recommended for use with LCD detergent.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8o9p0","text":"System verification test:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87mtp","text":"The system verification test checks the internal components and requires the use of the System Verification Assay Kit (Cat. no. {"blocks":[{"key":"713rb","text":"Handling samples:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3egbr","text":"For RNA tests, use appropriate RNAase-free handling techniques, including RNAse-free gloves, pipette tips, and tubes. Keep the tube lids closed whenever possible; do not press the pipette to the inside wall of the tube when withdrawing a sample. Return the RNA standards to -80°C as soon as possible.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fua6e","text":"Ensure the assay tubes are at room temperature at time of reading. Do not hold them in your hand and do not leave them in the Fluorometer for longer than it needs to take a measurement.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckr8v","text":"Use clean 0.5 mL PCR tube for each reading. Tubes must be dry on the outside. Moisture and condensation will lead to reading errors.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7gubv","text":"Minute bubbles in samples will cause reading errors. Be sure not to introduce bubbles into samples. Slight tapping on the tube wall or brief centrifugation will often help dissipate bubbles.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eb3es","text":"Multiple kits can be used for one sample to determine purity:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2132n","text":"Use the dsDNA BR Assay Kit together with the RNA BR Assay Kit. These measurements give you a better indication of sample purity than that produced by measuring the A260/A280 ratio. To measure protein contamination in nucleic acid samples, simply run 1–20 µL of the sample in the Qubit Protein Assay.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8d1ui","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bpm14","text":"Kit Options:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aoei","text":"dsDNA Broad Range Kit: The assay is highly selective for double-stranded DNA (dsDNA) over RNA and is accurate for initial sample concentrations from 100 pg/µL to 1000 ng/µL. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23},{"style":"bold","offset":149,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bq1u","text":"dsDNA High Sensitivity Kit:  The assay is highly selective for double stranded DNA (dsDNA) over RNA. Depending on sample volume, the assay is accurate for initial sample concentrations from 5 pg/µL to 120 ng/µL providing an assay range of 0.1–120 ng.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":26},{"style":"bold","offset":190,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bi88u","text":"RNA BR Kit: This assay is highly selective for RNA over double-stranded DNA (dsDNA) and is accurate for initial sample concentrations from 0.5 ng/μL to 1200 ng/μL, providing an assay range of 10−1,200 ng. Q32880, Q32881).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10},{"style":"bold","offset":139,"length":23},{"style":"bold","offset":244,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a181b","text":"Protein BR Kit: provides a quick and accurate method to quantitate protein samples over a broad range of concentrations for sample concentrations from 100 µg/mL to 20 mg/mL.
